item.title: How to Convert PED to FASTA
item.description: You may need the conversion of PED files to FASTA format in your studies for further analyses. Use below script for this purpose. PED to FASTA converter on GitHub Gets first 6 columns of each line as header line and the rest as the sequence replacing 0s with Ns and organizes it into a FASTA file. Note 0s are for missing nucleotides defined by default in PLINK How to run:
